arts.ttl: Five-star Bodo / Glimt cruise to win over Sturm Graz
arts.sum: Kasper Hogh scores the pick of the goals as last season's Europa League semi-finalists Bodo / Glimt soundly defeat Austrian side Sturm Graz 5-0 in the first leg of the Champions League play-offs at the Aspmyra Stadion in Norway.

arts.ttl: Bodo/Glimt vs. Sturm Graz - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Wednesday's Champions League clash between Bodo/Glimt and Sturm Graz, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
